00009 #include "scene.h"
00011 #define FONT_SPACING 10
00012 
00017 void TScene::BuildFont()
00018 {
00019     float cx,cy;         //x and y coordinate in texture
00020 
00021     //load font and background texture
00022     m_font2D_bkg = new Texture();
00023     m_font2D_bkg->Load("font_bkg",BASE,"../data/font_bkg.tga",MODULATE,1.0,1.0,1.0,false,false,-1);
00024     m_font2D_tex = new Texture();
00025     m_font2D_tex->Load("font",BASE,"../data/font.tga",MODULATE,1.0,1.0,1.0,false,false,-1);
00026 
00027     m_font2D = glGenLists(256);     //256 display lists
00028     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, m_font2D_tex->GetID());     //choose texture
00029     //generate 256 characters from texture and make display lists from them
00030     for (int i = 0; i < 16; i++)
00031     {
00032         for(int j = 0; j < 16; j++)
00033         {
00034             cx = j/16.0f;        //x position in texture
00035             cy = i/16.0f;        //y position in texture
00036 
00037             glNewList(m_font2D+i*16+j,GL_COMPILE);
00038             glBegin(GL_QUADS);            //1 char = 1 quad
00039             glTexCoord2f(cx,1.0f - cy - 0.0625f);            glVertex2i(0,0);
00040             glTexCoord2f(cx + 0.0625f, 1.0f -cy - 0.0625f);  glVertex2i(16,0);
00041             glTexCoord2f(cx + 0.0625f, 1.0f - cy);           glVertex2i(16,16);
00042             glTexCoord2f(cx, 1.0f - cy);                     glVertex2i(0,16);
00043             glEnd();
00044 
00045             glTranslated(FONT_SPACING,0,0);           //move to next character
00046             glEndList();
00047         }
00048     }
00049 }

00061 void TScene::DrawScreenText(const char *s, float px, float py, float size, bool center)
00062 {
00063     if(px < 0 || py < 0)
00064         return;
00065     //calculate real text position
00066     float x = m_resx*(px/100.0f);
00067     float y = m_resy*(py/100.0f);
00068     float sizex = size*FONT_SPACING*strlen(s);
00069     float sizey = FONT_SPACING*size;
00070 
00071     float offsetx;
00072     if(center)
00073         offsetx = 2.0f*sizex/3.0f;
00074     else
00075         offsetx = sizex;
00076 
00078     glUseProgram(0);
00079 
00080     //create orthogonal projection
00081     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00082     glLoadIdentity();
00083     glOrtho(0,m_resx,0,m_resy,-1,1);
00084     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00085     glLoadIdentity();
00086 
00087     glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
00088     glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00089     glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);                       //disable z-buffer
00090 
00091     //quad in background
00092     glColor4f(1.0,1.0,1.0,1.0);
00093     glBlendFunc(GL_ONE, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_COLOR);
00094     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00095     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, m_font2D_bkg->GetID()); //choose background texture
00096     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00097     glTexCoord2f(0.0,0.0); glVertex2f(x - offsetx, y - sizey);
00098     glTexCoord2f(1.0,0.0); glVertex2f(x + offsetx, y - sizey);
00099     glTexCoord2f(1.0,1.0); glVertex2f(x + offsetx, y + 2*sizey);
00100     glTexCoord2f(0.0,1.0); glVertex2f(x - offsetx, y + 2*sizey);
00101     glEnd();
00102 
00103     //font drawing
00104     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, m_font2D_tex->GetID()); //choose font texture
00105     glColor4f(1.0,0.5,0.0,1.0);
00106     glBlendFunc(GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_COLOR, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_COLOR);
00107 
00108     if(center)
00109         glTranslatef(x - sizex/2,y - sizey/2,0); //translate to center of drawing position
00110     else
00111         glTranslatef(x, y, 0);      //else to the first character
00112 
00113     glListBase(m_font2D);
00114     glScalef(size,size,size);
00115     glCallLists(strlen(s),GL_BYTE,s);
00116 
00117     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);                  //re-enable depth buffer
00118     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00119 }
